channel.title: Techradar on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Techradar on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Dwarves Radar Program
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Dwarves Radar Program The Dwarves have a spinning radar. This radar is how we assess and adopt new technology. Throughout the years, we observe the tech industry and pick out the most promising tech to put into the radar to begin the assessment process.
